sentence.Network_en: He didn't really know very much about javelin throwing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他其实并不太懂掷标枪.

sentence.Network_en: She achieved a throw of sixty metres in the javelin event.
sentence.Network_cn: 在掷标枪项目中,她掷了60米远.

sentence.Network_en: Harriet came second in the javelin.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈丽特掷标枪得了亚军.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French javeline, of Celtic origin

entry.def: A javelin is a long spear that is used in sports competitions. Competitors try to throw the javelin as far as possible.
You can refer to the competition in which the javelin is thrown as the javelin .

example.tran: 标枪冠军史蒂夫·巴克利

means.word_mean: 1. an athletic competition in which a javelin is thrown as far as possible
2. a spear thrown as a weapon or in competitive field events
